author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, hosted by NVIDIA, and learn how to enable agentic workflows that transform PC interactions through natural conversation and enable greater immersion in gameplay-changing experiences. 

This session includes the latest technologies available for NVIDIA ACE and examples of AI-enhanced avatars, function calling assistants, and co-pilots for digital human experiences running in the cloud or on local PC.

Learn more about using Unreal Engine for AAA games here: www.unrealengine.com/uses/games

#NVIDIA, #ACE, #AI, #AgenticWorkflows, #DigitalHumans, #GameDevelopment, #UnrealEngine, #UE 5.6, #UE5, ##UnrealFestOrlando
title: Build AI-powered Digital Humans in Unreal Engine 5 | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
This session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 demonstrates the next-generation navigation that integrates Unreal Engine with the in-vehicle map display module of Hyundai AutoEver, a high-quality display with a realistic map and gameplay-like screen composition. 

AutoEver’s navigation engine converts online map data into data for Unreal Engine's Scene Graph, from which rendering is performed in Unreal Engine to enable rendering key elements such as map backgrounds, buildings, and route lines in real-time.

Topics include the overall rendering pipeline, including how materials are applied to objects; Hyundai's decision to use vector tiles instead of converting all global map data into 3D assets, to reduce data transmission volume; the company's novel approach for converting vector tiles into Unreal Objects; and methods used to overcome performance issues encountered while applying this new engine to the embedded system.

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#HMI,
title: World's First UE5 Vehicle Navigation: Pioneering Vector Tiles | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
